post.post_title: 10 hidden gems in North America that you'll want to visit
post.post_content:
Creation timelines for the standard lorem

Richard McClintock, a Latin scholar from Hampden-Sydney College, is credited with discovering the source behind the ubiquitous filler text. In seeing a sample of lorem ipsum, his interest was piqued by consectetur—a genuine, albeit rare, Latin word. Consulting a Latin dictionary led McClintock to a passage from De Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (“On the Extremes of Good and Evil”), a first-century B.C. text from the Roman philosopher Cicero.

It's difficult to find examples of lorem ipsum in use before Letraset made it popular as a dummy text in the 1960s, although McClintock says he remembers coming across the lorem ipsum passage in a book of old metal type samples. So far he hasn't relocated where he once saw the passage, but the popularity of Cicero in the 15th century supports the theory that the filler text has been used for centuries.

And anyways, as Cecil Adams reasoned, “[Do you really] think graphic arts supply houses were hiring classics scholars in the 1960s?” Perhaps. But it seems reasonable to imagine that there was a version in use far before the age of Letraset.

post.post_content:
Creation timelines for the standard lorem

Richard McClintock, a Latin scholar from Hampden-Sydney College, is credited with discovering the source behind the ubiquitous filler text. In seeing a sample of lorem ipsum, his interest was piqued by consectetur—a genuine, albeit rare, Latin word. Consulting a Latin dictionary led McClintock to a passage from De Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (“On the Extremes of Good and Evil”), a first-century B.C. text from the Roman philosopher Cicero. It's difficult to find examples of lorem ipsum in use before Letraset made it popular as a dummy text in the 1960s, although McClintock says he remembers coming across the lorem ipsum passage in a book of old metal type samples. So far he hasn't relocated where he once saw the passage, but the popularity of Cicero in the 15th century supports the theory that the filler text has been used for centuries. And anyways, as Cecil Adams reasoned, “[Do you really] think graphic arts supply houses were hiring classics scholars in the 1960s?” Perhaps. But it seems reasonable to imagine that there was a version in use far before the age of Letraset. post.post_content:
Creation timelines for the standard lorem

Richard McClintock, a Latin scholar from Hampden-Sydney College, is credited with discovering the source behind the ubiquitous filler text. In seeing a sample of lorem ipsum, his interest was piqued by consectetur—a genuine, albeit rare, Latin word. Consulting a Latin dictionary led McClintock to a passage from De Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (“On the Extremes of Good and Evil”), a first-century B.C. text from the Roman philosopher Cicero. It's difficult to find examples of lorem ipsum in use before Letraset made it popular as a dummy text in the 1960s, although McClintock says he remembers coming across the lorem ipsum passage in a book of old metal type samples. So far he hasn't relocated where he once saw the passage, but the popularity of Cicero in the 15th century supports the theory that the filler text has been used for centuries. And anyways, as Cecil Adams reasoned, “[Do you really] think graphic arts supply houses were hiring classics scholars in the 1960s?” Perhaps. But it seems reasonable to imagine that there was a version in use far before the age of Letraset. page.post_content:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

page.post_content:
Relax by the pool!

the best surfing

The perfect vacation rental property on the beach is waiting for you! Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Book now

Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

Looking for a fun-filled beach trip package?

Look no further! Our package includes round-trip transportation, a three-night stay in a hotel, and breakfast each morning. Come relax on the beach and enjoy all the area has to offer. Book now and start packing!

LEARN MORE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E

Features of our hotel

The perfect vacation rental property on the beach is waiting for you! Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Our spacious and well-appointed condo features a full kitchen, private balcony, and Gulf-front views.

Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, enjoy a beachfront BBQ, or take a stroll on the beach, we've got you covered! We're sure you'll love our property as much as we do, so come on over and enjoy the best of the Gulf Coast!

Learn More

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Rooms & Suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Previous Next Large From  $150

Blue Lagoon

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated From  $150

Coral Reef

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability Previous Next Large From  $150

Starfish Suite

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability

Relax by the pool

the beach is waiting for you

Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Book now

Covid-19 Updates

As of today, we are no longer allowing any guests in the hostel who are not from the local area. This is in line with the new government regulations which are in place to help prevent the spread.

Learn More

Read our blog

page.post_content:
Includes all meals, drinks, and activities

Packages & Specials

Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km

Beachfront resort in Mexico

The first special offer is a five-day, four-night stay for two people at a beachfront resort in Mexico. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $199 per person Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km

A private villa on a tropical island

The second special offer is a seven-day, six-night stay for two people in a private villa on a tropical island. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $299 per person Learn More
  • 5.0
  • 10 km

A luxury beachfront villa

The third special offer is a ten-day, nine-night stay for two people in a luxury beachfront villa. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $195 per person Learn More
Great offer for you

Unique offer for weekend only - $199/day

Looking for a relaxing weekend getaway? Look no further than our beachhouse! With stunning ocean views, miles of sandy beaches, and plenty of activities nearby, you'll be sure to enjoy your time here. So come on over and escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life!

Book Now

Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

page.post_content:
Stunning ocean views

Explore

Welcome to our beachhouse! Our vacation rental is perfect for those who love the beach. With stunning ocean views, our house is the perfect place to relax and enjoy your vacation. Our house is fully furnished and includes all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay. We hope you enjoy your stay!

Learn More From  $130 per person
  • 5.0
  • 10 km from Chalet

Charming cafe

Looking for a great spot to enjoy some coffee and people watch? Look no further than Cafe by the Beach! This charming cafe is located right near the beach, making it the perfect spot to relax and take in the sights and sounds of the ocean. !

Learn More 25% Off From  $99 per person
  • 5.0
  •   5 Minute walk

Spa

Looking for a relaxing spa day near the beach? Look no further than our spa! Our experienced professionals will help you melt away your stress and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Learn More

A Breathtaking View

What to see...

Near a beach, you can explore tide pools, coral reefs, and shipwrecks. Tide pools are small, enclosed areas in the rocks that are filled with water at high tide and exposed at low tide. They are home to a variety of marine life, including sea stars, urchins, anemones, and crabs.

LEARN MORE Previous Next

Shipwrecks are often home to a variety of marine life.

Near a beach, you can explore tide pools, coral reefs, and shipwrecks. Tide pools are small, enclosed areas in the rocks that are filled with water at high tide and exposed at low tide. They are home to a variety of marine life, including sea stars, urchins, anemones, and crabs. Coral reefs are underwater structures made of coral, which is a type of limestone made of the skeletons of small marine animals.

A great place to explore the beach and enjoy the sun.

Some places to explore near a beach are tide pools, a nearby forest, or a neighboring city. Tide pools are areas near the shoreline that are filled with water during high tide but exposed during low tide. They are a great place to explore marine life. A nearby forest is a great place to explore plants and animals, and a neighboring city can offer a variety of different places to explore, such as museums and restaurants.

page.post_content:
The perfect vacation rental

Our Blog

Leave the city behind to explore the great outdoors at our Outposts in the town of Catskill, New York.

Learn More 13/01/2022

10 hidden gems in North America that you’ll want to visit

Here at The Traveling Yogi, we believe that travel is the best way to learn about yourself and the world around you. …

Read More 01/01/2022

The most underrated places in California

We want to help you make your travel dreams a reality, with advice on everything from packing to budgeting. …

Read More 01/01/2022

Our Essential Vacation Tips

So come explore with us – we can't wait to show you the world! …

Read More 01/01/2022

Top Destinations Reviewed

Are you ready to see some of the most beautiful and awe-inspiring places on Earth? …

Read More 01/01/2022

Our Answers Your Top Questions

Then join us as we journey to some of the most off-the-beaten-path destinations out there. …

Read More 01/01/2022

The World Experience

We'll show you how to make the most of your travel experiences, both big and small. …

Read More 01/01/2022

Multi-Day vs Single-DayTrips

And we'll share tips and tricks for living a nomadic lifestyle without sacrificing your comfort or safety. …

Read More 01/01/2022

Planning Your Adventure

So what are you waiting for? Come explore the world with us! …

Read More More Articles

page.post_content:
Home - Why Us

Why Us

Here at our beachouse, we believe that family comes first. We are a tight knit group who love spending time together.

Learn More

Enjoy the waves and sand. So fun!

We believe in quality time and making memories. Our beachouse is the perfect place to do just that! Our home is located right on the beach, which means that we can enjoy the waves and sand anytime we want. And, we have plenty of room for everyone, so no one has to miss out on any of the fun! We also have a pool, so we can cool off when we need to. Plus, we have a ton of games and activities to keep us busy, whether we’re inside or outside. We can’t wait to share our beachouse with you and your family!

Welcome you to our beachouse!

We understand that when you're on vacation, you want to relax and enjoy yourself without having to worry about anything. That's why we offer all of our guests complimentary services like beach access, parking, wifi, and more. Plus, our beachouse is located in the heart of Destin, so you're just a short walk from some of the best shopping, dining, and nightlife around. We can't wait to welcome you to our beachouse!

pub crawl once a week

A bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

free city map

This map will help you find your way around the city, and it will also show you where all of the interesting attractions are.

Free Wifi

Stay connected while on-the-go with complimentary wifi throughout the hotel.

24 Hour Reception

The hostel has a 24-hour reception, and security lockers are available for guests to store their belongings.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E

Relaxation and excitement.

The perfect vacation destination

Looking for a place to get away? Come to our beach house! We have everything you need for a relaxing vacation. From the sandy beaches to the comfortable accommodations, we have it all!

98% Positive reviews

Our well-rated beach resort is perfect for budget-minded travelers. With slopes for all levels of skiers, our resort is sure to please everyone in your group.

We are on:
Privacy 70% Space 85% Location 80% Amenities 96%

People say about Us

Welcome to our beach house reviews page! We are excited to share our experiences with you and help you find the perfect beach house for your next vacation. Our team has years of experience in the rental industry and we are committed to providing you with the best possible service.

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"We had a great stay at the beach! The location was perfect and the chalet had everything we needed. The view was beautiful and we enjoyed the hot tub every night. We would definitely recommend this chalet to others and would love to stay here again."

Lindsey Lipshutz

CEO

"The beach was beautiful and had a great location. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back."

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"The beach was very cozy and perfect for a relaxing vacation. We enjoyed the quiet location and would love to come back again."

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"The beach was a great place to stay. It was very comfortable and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay there again." Gretchen Gouse

CEO

page.post_content:
Our menu offers a variety of items

Our Menu

Our menu offers a variety of items perfect for a day spent by the ocean. Our appetizers include crab dip and chips, while our main courses include fish tacos and a burger. Our desserts are sure to sweeten your day, including a sundae and a brownie. We hope you enjoy your time at our beachouse!

Learn More Breakfast Lunch Dinner Salad Drinks

Oatmeal with honey and nuts

$19

Warm and comforting oatmeal with a sweet and nutty topping.

$19

Scrambled eggs with toast

$15

A classic breakfast dish that is quick and easy to prepare.

$15

Smoothie

$12

A healthy and refreshing way to start your day, made with your favorite fruits and yogurt.

$12

Fresh fruit salad

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15

Yogurt with fruit and granola

$15

A healthy and filling breakfast with plenty of protein and fiber.

$15

Waffle

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15

Chicken Caesar Salad

$25

A healthy and delicious salad made with chopped romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

$25

Turkey Club Sandwich

$25

A hearty sandwich made with oven roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Served on toasted bread.

$25

Roasted Vegetable Quiche

$22

A savory and satisfying quiche made with roasted veggies, Swiss cheese, and eggs. Served with a side salad.

$22

Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich

$10

A classic childhood favorite. Made with creamy peanut butter and delicious strawberry jelly. Served on fresh bread.

$10

Grilled Cheese Sandwich

$12

A classic comfort food. Made with American cheese and grilled on fresh bread.

$12

Hummus and Pita Chips

$20

A healthy and tasty snack. Made with creamy hummus and crispy pita chips.

$20

Fried Calamari

$35

Lightly battered and fried calamari served with a spicy marinara sauce.

$35

Baked Brie

$22

Brie cheese wrapped in puff pastry and baked until golden brown. Served with a sweet apricot sauce.

$22

Buffalo Chicken Dip

$15

A creamy and cheesy dip made with shredded chicken, buffalo sauce, and ranch dressing.

$15

Tomato Basil Soup

$15

A creamy and delicious tomato soup made with fresh tomatoes and basil.

$15

House Salad

$17

A simple salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and croutons.

$17

Pork Tenderloin

$35

A tender and juicy pork tenderloin served with a mushroom and Madeira sauce.

$35

Garden of Eden Salad

$22

This salad is named after the Garden of Eden because it contains all of the earth's bounty. It includes mixed greens, sliced apples, dried cranberries, toasted walnuts, and Gorgonzola cheese. The dressing is a simple balsamic vinaigrette.

$22

Caesar Salad

$25

This classic salad is made with Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

$25

Greek Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano

$22

Waldorf Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, apples, grapes, celery, and toasted walnuts. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and honey.

$22

Draft Beers

$12

Miller Lite, Yuengling, Sam Adams, Blue Moon

$12

Wines by the Glass

$10

White Zinfandel, Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, Moscato Red Zinfandel, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Pinot Noir, Shiraz

$10

Cocktails

$17

Margarita, Long Island Iced Tea, Strawberry Daiquiri, Mojito, Martini, Cosmopolitan, Manhattan

$17

Bottled Beers

$8

Budweiser, Bud Light, Coors Light, Corona, Heineken, Sam Adams, Sierra Nevada, Stella Artois

$8 Previous Next

Chef

Craig Culhane

Chef John is a self-taught chef who has been cooking since he was a young boy. He fell in love with cooking while spending time in the kitchen with his grandmother. After working in a few restaurants, he opened his own beachside eatery. Chef John's beachhouse is a favorite spot for locals and visitors alike, thanks to his delicious, made-from-scratch cuisine. He loves using fresh, seasonal ingredients in his dishes, and his culinary creativity is on full display in his unique menu items. When he's not in the kitchen, Chef John can be found relaxing on the beach, surfing, or fishing.

page.post_content:
Home - Booking confirmed

Booking confirmed

Leave the city behind to explore the great outdoors at our Outposts in the town of Catskill, New York.

Home - Booking cancellation

Booking cancellation

Leave the city behind to explore the great outdoors at our Outposts in the town of Catskill, New York.

page.post_content:
Welcome to the Bellevue Hostel

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Bellevue Hotel + Bed and Breakfast's Website.

page.post_content:
Home - Contact

Contact Us

  • +00 (00) 0000 000 00
  • +00 (00) 0000 000 00
  • West Coast of North America
We are in social:
Instagram Facebook

Questions?

If you're looking for a vacation rental, you've come to the right place! Our FAQ page will answer all of your questions about renting a vacation property.

What amenities are included in the rental? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo. What is the check-in and check-out procedure? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo. What is the cancellation policy? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo. How is the payment processed?

The passage experienced a surge in popularity during the 1960s when Letraset used it on their dry-transfer sheets, and again during the 90s as desktop publishers bundled the text with their software. Today it’s seen all around the web; on templates, websites, and stock designs. Use our generator to get your own, or read on for the authoritative history of lorem ipsum.

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

Leave the city behind to explore the great outdoors at our Outposts in the town of Catskill, New York.

Unfortunately, your transaction cannot be completed at this time. Please try again or contact us.

page.post_content:
Home - Payment success

Payment success

Leave the city behind to explore the great outdoors at our Outposts in the town of Catskill, New York.

Thank you for your payment. Your transaction has been completed and a receipt for your purchase has been emailed to you. We look forward to seeing you soon.

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Learn More Sort: All BrightEn suiteUpdated Large

Blue Lagoon

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

$150 Check Availability Updated

Coral Reef

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

$150 Check Availability Large

Starfish Suite

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

$150 Check Availability

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Learn More Previous Next Large

Blue Lagoon

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

  • Wifi
  • Storage
  • Kitchen
  • Confortable
Check Availability From  $150 Previous Next Updated

Coral Reef

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • EnSuite
Check Availability From  $150 Previous Next Large

Starfish Suite

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • EnSuite
Check Availability From  $150

Check Availability

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Learn More Previous Next Large
  • 5 min walk to city

Blue Lagoon

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

From  $150 Check Availability Previous Next Updated
  • 5 min walk to city

Coral Reef

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

From  $150 Check Availability Previous Next Large
  • 5 min walk to city

Starfish Suite

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

From  $150 Check Availability

Check Availability

A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Learn More Previous Next From  $150 Large

Blue Lagoon

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

Check Availability
Previous Next From  $150 Updated

Coral Reef

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability
Previous Next From  $150 Large

Starfish Suite

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability

Check Availability

page.post_content:
A relaxing beach vacation!

Our Rooms

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Learn More Previous Next Large From  $150
  • 5 min walk to city

Blue Lagoon

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

  • Wifi
  • Storage
  • Kitchen
  • Confortable
Check Availability Previous Next Updated From  $150
  • 5 min walk to city

Coral Reef

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • EnSuite
Check Availability Previous Next Large From  $150
  • 5 min walk to city

Starfish Suite

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

  • Wifi
  • Breakfast
  • Room Service
  • EnSuite
Check Availability

Check Availability

page.post_content:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

Blue Lagoon

(230 Ratings)  5/5

5 mins to beach

MORE PHOTOS tyler-nix-DvAeKMxMVQ4-unsplashedward-howell-TACZ-gz4li4-unsplashralph-ravi-kayden-CsqHFS6ZXfM-unsplashpaolo-nicolello-2gOxKj594nM-unsplash

Private beach

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Cabana service

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Towels

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Umbrellas

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Welcome to Beach House!

Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, enjoy a beachfront BBQ, or take a stroll on the beach, we've got you covered! We're sure you'll love our property as much as we do, so come on over and enjoy the best of the Gulf Coast!

Amenities

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the lockbox.

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

People say about Us

Come to our beach house! We have everything you need for a relaxing vacation. From the sandy beaches to the comfortable accommodations, we have it all!

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real" Lindsey Lipshutz

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real"

Melt away your stress and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Looking for a relaxing spa day near the beach? Look no further than our spa! Our experienced professionals will help you melt away your stress and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
mphb_room_type.post_excerpt: This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Previous Next Popular  5/5

Coral Reef

Coral Reef is a large, open room with a high ceiling. The walls and floor are covered in white tiles, and the room is filled with bright, blue light. There are several large, artificial coral reefs in the center of the room, and several smaller ones along the walls. The room is often used for swimming classes and water aerobics. The Coral Reef room features walls of rich blue and green tile, with brightly colored fish and coral decorations. A large glass panel in the wall offers a view of the aquarium's coral reef and tropical fish.

Amenities

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the lockbox.

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Check Availability

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

People say about Us

Looking for the perfect place to spend your summer vacation? Look no further than the beachhouse! This page is dedicated to reviews of beachhouses from all over the country. Whether you're looking for a quiet, secluded getaway or a house right on the beach, we've got you covered.

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real" Lindsey Lipshutz

CEO

You may also like...

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Large From  $150

Blue Lagoon

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

Check Availability Updated From  $150

Coral Reef

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability Large From  $150

Starfish Suite

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

mphb_room_type.post_content:
Previous Next Popular  5/5

Beach House 3

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammeled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will.

Amenities

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the lockbox.

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Check Availability

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

elementor_library.post_content:
Creation timelines for the standard lorem

Richard McClintock, a Latin scholar from Hampden-Sydney College, is credited with discovering the source behind the ubiquitous filler text. In seeing a sample of lorem ipsum, his interest was piqued by consectetur—a genuine, albeit rare, Latin word. Consulting a Latin dictionary led McClintock to a passage from De Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (“On the Extremes of Good and Evil”), a first-century B.C. text from the Roman philosopher Cicero.

It's difficult to find examples of lorem ipsum in use before Letraset made it popular as a dummy text in the 1960s, although McClintock says he remembers coming across the lorem ipsum passage in a book of old metal type samples. So far he hasn't relocated where he once saw the passage, but the popularity of Cicero in the 15th century supports the theory that the filler text has been used for centuries.

And anyways, as Cecil Adams reasoned, “[Do you really] think graphic arts supply houses were hiring classics scholars in the 1960s?” Perhaps. But it seems reasonable to imagine that there was a version in use far before the age of Letraset.

elementor_library.post_content:
Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

Blue Lagoon

(230 Ratings)  5/5

5 mins to beach

MORE PHOTOS tyler-nix-DvAeKMxMVQ4-unsplashedward-howell-TACZ-gz4li4-unsplashralph-ravi-kayden-CsqHFS6ZXfM-unsplashpaolo-nicolello-2gOxKj594nM-unsplash

Private beach

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Cabana service

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Towels

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Umbrellas

Here is the lorem ipsum passage followed by Boparai's

Welcome to Beach House!

Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, enjoy a beachfront BBQ, or take a stroll on the beach, we've got you covered! We're sure you'll love our property as much as we do, so come on over and enjoy the best of the Gulf Coast!

Amenities

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the lockbox.

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

People say about Us

Come to our beach house! We have everything you need for a relaxing vacation. From the sandy beaches to the comfortable accommodations, we have it all!

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real" Lindsey Lipshutz

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real"

Melt away your stress and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Looking for a relaxing spa day near the beach? Look no further than our spa! Our experienced professionals will help you melt away your stress and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

  • 10 km

Beachfront resort in Mexico

The first special offer is a five-day, four-night stay for two people at a beachfront resort in Mexico. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $199 per person Learn More
  • 5.0

A private villa on a tropical island

The second special offer is a seven-day, six-night stay for two people in a private villa on a tropical island. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $299 per person Learn More
  • 5.0

A luxury beachfront villa

The third special offer is a ten-day, nine-night stay for two people in a luxury beachfront villa. The package includes all meals, drinks, and activities.

From $195 per person Learn More

elementor_library.post_content:
Relax by the pool!

the best surfing

The perfect vacation rental property on the beach is waiting for you! Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Book now

Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

Looking for a fun-filled beach trip package?

Look no further! Our package includes round-trip transportation, a three-night stay in a hotel, and breakfast each morning. Come relax on the beach and enjoy all the area has to offer. Book now and start packing!

LEARN MORE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E

Features of our hotel

The perfect vacation rental property on the beach is waiting for you! Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Our spacious and well-appointed condo features a full kitchen, private balcony, and Gulf-front views.

Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, enjoy a beachfront BBQ, or take a stroll on the beach, we've got you covered! We're sure you'll love our property as much as we do, so come on over and enjoy the best of the Gulf Coast!

Learn More

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

Rooms & Suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation, including a private balcony overlooking the ocean, plush bedding, and a full kitchen.

Previous Next Large From  $150

Blue Lagoon

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is named after the blue lagoon due to the blue tiles that line the walls and the blue curtains that hang from the window.

Check Availability Previous Next Updated From  $150

Coral Reef

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of pink and coral with accents of green. It has a queen bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability Previous Next Large From  $150

Starfish Suite

Sleeps 2, Queen Bed

This room is decorated in shades of blue and white with accents of red. It has a king bed, a private balcony, and an ocean view.

Check Availability

Relax by the pool

the beach is waiting for you

Our property is located on the beautiful Gulf Coast and offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Book now

Covid-19 Updates

As of today, we are no longer allowing any guests in the hostel who are not from the local area. This is in line with the new government regulations which are in place to help prevent the spread.

elementor_library.post_content:
reviews about us

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"We had a great stay at the chalet! The location was perfect and the chalet had everything we needed. The view was beautiful and we enjoyed the hot tub every night. We would definitely recommend this chalet to others and would love to stay here again."

Lindsey Lipshutz

CEO

"The chalet was beautiful and had a great location. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back."

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"The chalet was very cozy and perfect for a relaxing vacation. We enjoyed the quiet location and would love to come back again."

Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"The chalet was a great place to stay. It was very comfortable and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay there again." Gretchen Gouse

CEO

"Until recently, the prevailing view assumed lorem ipsum was born as a nonsense text. “It's not Latin, though it looks like it, and it actually says nothing,” Before & After magazine answered a curious reader, “Its ‘words’ loosely approximate the frequency with which letters occur in English, which is why at a glance it looks pretty real"

elementor_library.post_content:
Breakfast Lunch Dinner Salad Drinks Breakfast

Oatmeal with honey and nuts

$19

Warm and comforting oatmeal with a sweet and nutty topping.

$19

Scrambled eggs with toast

$15

A classic breakfast dish that is quick and easy to prepare.

$15

Smoothie

$12

A healthy and refreshing way to start your day, made with your favorite fruits and yogurt.

$12

Fresh fruit salad

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15

Yogurt with fruit and granola

$15

A healthy and filling breakfast with plenty of protein and fiber.

$15

Waffle

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15 Lunch

Chicken Caesar Salad

$25

A healthy and delicious salad made with chopped romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

$25

Turkey Club Sandwich

$25

A hearty sandwich made with oven roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Served on toasted bread.

$25

Roasted Vegetable Quiche

$22

A savory and satisfying quiche made with roasted veggies, Swiss cheese, and eggs. Served with a side salad.

$22

Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich

$10

A classic childhood favorite. Made with creamy peanut butter and delicious strawberry jelly. Served on fresh bread.

$10

Grilled Cheese Sandwich

$12

A classic comfort food. Made with American cheese and grilled on fresh bread.

$12

Hummus and Pita Chips

$20

A healthy and tasty snack. Made with creamy hummus and crispy pita chips.

$20 Dinner

Fried Calamari

$35

Lightly battered and fried calamari served with a spicy marinara sauce.

$35

Baked Brie

$22

Brie cheese wrapped in puff pastry and baked until golden brown. Served with a sweet apricot sauce.

$22

Buffalo Chicken Dip

$15

A creamy and cheesy dip made with shredded chicken, buffalo sauce, and ranch dressing.

$15

Tomato Basil Soup

$15

A creamy and delicious tomato soup made with fresh tomatoes and basil.

$15

House Salad

$17

A simple salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and croutons.

$17

Pork Tenderloin

$35

A tender and juicy pork tenderloin served with a mushroom and Madeira sauce.

$35 Salad

Garden of Eden Salad

$22

This salad is named after the Garden of Eden because it contains all of the earth's bounty. It includes mixed greens, sliced apples, dried cranberries, toasted walnuts, and Gorgonzola cheese. The dressing is a simple balsamic vinaigrette.

$22

Caesar Salad

$25

This classic salad is made with Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

$25

Greek Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano

$22

Waldorf Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, apples, grapes, celery, and toasted walnuts. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and honey.

$22 Drinks

Draft Beers

$12

Miller Lite, Yuengling, Sam Adams, Blue Moon

$12

Wines by the Glass

$10

White Zinfandel, Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, Moscato Red Zinfandel, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Pinot Noir, Shiraz

$10

Cocktails

$17

Margarita, Long Island Iced Tea, Strawberry Daiquiri, Mojito, Martini, Cosmopolitan, Manhattan

Bottled Beers

Budweiser, Bud Light, Coors Light, Corona, Heineken, Sam Adams, Sierra Nevada, Stella Artois

Features of our hotel

Don't bother typing “lorem ipsum” into Google translate. If you already tried, you may have gotten anything from "NATO" to "China", depending on how you capitalized.

The bizarre translation was fodder for conspiracy theories, but Google has since updated its “lorem ipsum” translation to, boringly enough, “lorem ipsum”. One brave soul did take a stab at translating the almost-not-quite-Latin.

elementor_library.post_content:
Breakfast Lunch Dinner Salad Drinks Breakfast

Oatmeal with honey and nuts

$19

Warm and comforting oatmeal with a sweet and nutty topping.

$19

Scrambled eggs with toast

$15

A classic breakfast dish that is quick and easy to prepare.

$15

Smoothie

$12

A healthy and refreshing way to start your day, made with your favorite fruits and yogurt.

$12

Fresh fruit salad

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15

Yogurt with fruit and granola

$15

A healthy and filling breakfast with plenty of protein and fiber.

$15

Waffle

$15

A mix of seasonal fruit, diced and tossed in a light syrup or dressing.

$15 Lunch

Chicken Caesar Salad

$25

A healthy and delicious salad made with chopped romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

$25

Turkey Club Sandwich

$25

A hearty sandwich made with oven roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Served on toasted bread.

$25

Roasted Vegetable Quiche

$22

A savory and satisfying quiche made with roasted veggies, Swiss cheese, and eggs. Served with a side salad.

$22

Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich

$10

A classic childhood favorite. Made with creamy peanut butter and delicious strawberry jelly. Served on fresh bread.

$10

Grilled Cheese Sandwich

$12

A classic comfort food. Made with American cheese and grilled on fresh bread.

$12

Hummus and Pita Chips

$20

A healthy and tasty snack. Made with creamy hummus and crispy pita chips.

$20 Dinner

Fried Calamari

$35

Lightly battered and fried calamari served with a spicy marinara sauce.

$35

Baked Brie

$22

Brie cheese wrapped in puff pastry and baked until golden brown. Served with a sweet apricot sauce.

$22

Buffalo Chicken Dip

$15

A creamy and cheesy dip made with shredded chicken, buffalo sauce, and ranch dressing.

$15

Tomato Basil Soup

$15

A creamy and delicious tomato soup made with fresh tomatoes and basil.

$15

House Salad

$17

A simple salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and croutons.

$17

Pork Tenderloin

$35

A tender and juicy pork tenderloin served with a mushroom and Madeira sauce.

$35 Salad

Garden of Eden Salad

$22

This salad is named after the Garden of Eden because it contains all of the earth's bounty. It includes mixed greens, sliced apples, dried cranberries, toasted walnuts, and Gorgonzola cheese. The dressing is a simple balsamic vinaigrette.

$22

Caesar Salad

$25

This classic salad is made with Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

$25

Greek Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano

$22

Waldorf Salad

$22

This salad is made with mixed greens, apples, grapes, celery, and toasted walnuts. The dressing is a simple vinaigrette made with apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and honey.

$22 Drinks

Draft Beers

$12

Miller Lite, Yuengling, Sam Adams, Blue Moon

$12

Wines by the Glass

$10

White Zinfandel, Chardonnay, Pinot Grigio, Sauvignon Blanc, Riesling, Moscato Red Zinfandel, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Pinot Noir, Shiraz

$10

Cocktails

$17

Margarita, Long Island Iced Tea, Strawberry Daiquiri, Mojito, Martini, Cosmopolitan, Manhattan

$17

Bottled Beers

$8

Budweiser, Bud Light, Coors Light, Corona, Heineken, Sam Adams, Sierra Nevada, Stella Artois

$8

elementor_library.post_content:
Sunbathe on the beach

Lay out a towel on the sand and catch some rays.

Amazing food

A classic beach food that is perfect for enjoying on a hot day.

Swim in the ocean

Dip your toes in the water and then take a plunge into the deep blue sea.

Rental suites

Our suites provide all the amenities you need for a relaxing beach vacation.

elementor_library.post_content:
Additional services

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

pub crawl once a week

A bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

free city map

This map will help you find your way around the city, and it will also show you where all of the interesting attractions are.

Free Wifi

Stay connected while on-the-go with complimentary wifi throughout the hotel.

24 Hour Reception

The hostel has a 24-hour reception, and security lockers are available for guests to store their belongings.

elementor_library.post_content:
Perfect for young travelers

Located in the heart of the city, The Trendy Hostel is the perfect place to stay for budget-minded travelers. With free Wi-Fi and a continental breakfast included in the price of your stay, you'll be able to save your money for exploring all that the city has to offer.

Our location is perfect for exploring all that the city has to offer, and we offer a variety of amenities and services to make your stay enjoyable. Our staff is friendly and knowledgeable, and we're always here to help you make the most of your stay. We hope you'll come and stay with us soon!

Learn More

Laundry service

There are laundry facilities and kitchen facilities for guests to use.

Breakfast service

The hostel offers a free breakfast every morning, as well as free wifi and linens.

Shuttle service

Avoid the hassle of airport transfers and take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service.

Local beers and wines

There is also a bar on-site that serves local beers and wines, and a pub crawl is organised once a week.

elementor_library.post_content:
Previous Next Popular  5/5

Beach House 2

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammeled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will.

Amenities

Self check-in

Check yourself in with the lockbox.

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Check Availability

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.

Previous Next Popular  5/5

Beach House 2

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammeled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will.

Amenities

Self check-in

Enhanced Clean

This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process

Entire home

You’ll have the tiny house to yourself.

Check Availability

Do you want to rent a room?

Leave your phone number and we will call you back.
